mapper.update: update route set cityID = #{cityID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, provinceID = #{provinceID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, routeName = #{routeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, startProvice = #{startProvice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, startCity = #{startCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, endProvince = #{endProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, endCity = #{endCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, midProvince = #{midProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, midCity = #{midCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, transportPrice = #{transportPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, Comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where routeID = #{routeID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select routeID, cityID, provinceID, routeName, startProvice, startCity, endProvince, endCity, midProvince, midCity, transportPrice, Comment from route where routeID = #{routeID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select routeID, cityID, provinceID, routeName, startProvice, startCity, endProvince, endCity, midProvince, midCity, transportPrice, Comment from route
